classes.name: mrz1
classes.tesseract_config: --oem 3 --psm 13 -c tessedit_char_whitelist=ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789< -c textord_heavy_nr=1 -c edges_childarea=0.95 -c edges_boxarea=0.95 -c load_system_dawg=0 -c load_freq_dawg=0 -c tessedit_fix_fuzzy_spaces=1 -c tessedit_char_unblacklist_xht_gains=0 -c textord_no_rejects=1 -c preserve_interword_spaces=1
